author: Timothy W. Martin
title: Samsung Electronics Moves to Expand and Diversify Board—and Critics Shrug
text:
SEOUL—Samsung Electronics Co. expanded the size of its board of directors and added three new independent members, in the face of criticism that the world’s largest smartphone maker needs stronger corporate governance.

Following a vote at the company’s annual shareholder meeting on Friday, its 11-member board will now include a Korean-American tech entrepreneur and a South Korea legal expert who will be Samsung Electronics’ second-ever female director. The third new independent member is a semiconductors expert and Seoul National...
